org.openadaptor.spring.processor.factory
Class AbstractSimpleRecordProcessorGroupFactoryBean

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.spring.processor.factory.AbstractProcessorGroupFactoryBean
          org.openadaptor.spring.processor.factory.AbstractSimpleRecordProcessorGroupFactoryBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean, IComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeSetProcessorGroupFactoryBean, ValueAliasProcessorGroupFactoryBean
public abstract class AbstractSimpleRecordProcessorGroupFactoryBean
extends AbstractProcessorGroupFactoryBean

Abstract superclass for FactoryBeans that instantiate ProcessorGroups of AbstractSimpleRecordProcessor subclasses.

The ProcessorGroup can be optionally prepended with an insatance of SimpleRecordAttributesExistProcessor which can be used to ensure that given attributes will always exist in incoming records so that they can be safelt referenced in any expressions that reference the incoming record.

Author:
Kevin Scully

Field Detail

simpleRecordAccessor

protected ISimpleRecordAccessor simpleRecordAccessor
SimpleRecordAccessor to be used by all Processors in the group.

attributeTypeMap

protected java.util.Map attributeTypeMap
This map may be used to provide type 'hints' for arguments to an expression Currently supported types are Double,Long,Date,String. All ExpressionProcessors in the ProcessorGroup are given the same TypeMap.

mandatoryIncomingRecordAttributes

protected java.util.List mandatoryIncomingRecordAttributes
List of attributes that must exist in the incoming records.
